brand.name: Laurence Delvallez
brand.ethicalInfo1: Laurence Delvallez is a timeless Belgian jewellery label.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Laurence Delvallez's environment rating is 'not good enough'. It does not use eco-friendly materials. It makes products by hand to reduce its climate impact. There is no evidence it has taken meaningful action to reduce or eliminate hazardous chemicals. There is no evidence it implements water reduction initiatives.

Its labour rating is 'not good enough'. Its final stage of production is undertaken in the European Union, a low/medium risk region for labour abuse. There is no evidence it has a Code of Conduct. There is no evidence it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. There is no evidence it audits any of its supply chain.

Its animal rating is 'it's a start'. It does not use fur, down, exotic animal skin, exotic animal hair or angora. It uses leather.

Laurence Delvallez is rated 'Not good enough' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear Laurence Delvallez, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Laurence Delvallez, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
